name: Bubble Viking: Bubble Shooter
description:
Viking and her pigs need your help to fend off the dark pirates that are destory their land. Travel the Mysterious ocean area bursting as many bubbles as you can in this amazing bubble shooting puzzle adventure. Win levels and free Viking country piece by piece.
Bubble shooter bursting with an nearly endless levels of challenges!

Connect to Facebook and share or compare scores with friends, or if you’re feeling generous, you can always send them some gifts!
FEATURES
– Super easy & free to pick up and play.
– Over 500 levels! New levels added every 2 weeks.
– Beautiful graphics and animations. Amazing bubble bursting !
– New and improved game modes
– With different level types and boss, you’ll never get bored.
– Collect stars to unlock special items to help you on your quest
– Connect to Facebook to challenge friends and share gifts.
-----------------------------
Bubble Viking is completely free to play, ,it’s tons of fun and surprise!
